contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 26th day of March, 2004, the ORDER of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED. The Emergency Application for Expedited Appeal Pursuant to Pa.R.A.P. 310(e) and Emergency Application For Stay of the March 8, 2004 Order of the Commonwealth Court Pursuant to Pa.R.A.P. 1732 is hereby DENIED.
